name: Hit the Ice: VHL - The Video Hockey League
summary: Unreleased - Train your players, prime them for the game ahead and when you're read... Hit the Ice! Select your team of badass players and then take to the frozen water to whack the puck around and score big points! Keep passing and shooting to make the scoreboard and defeat the competition with ease! Just try to avoid getting into too many fights before the final whistle!
